title: Subpart  - Transactions with Persons other than Clients
content:
Subpart  - Transactions with Persons other than Clients

State Regulations
§ 1200.4.1 - Truthfulness in statements to others
§ 1200.4.2 - Communication with person represented by counsel
§ 1200.4.3 - Communicating with unrepresented persons
§ 1200.4.4 - Respect for rights of third persons
§ 1200.4.5 - Communication after incidents involving personal injury or wrongful death

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
